original: 金城郡人，本為韓遂部下。潼關之戰後，韓遂敗走金城羌中，之後被其帳下西平、金城諸將麴演、蔣石等所殺，並梟首送往曹操。一說是韓遂病死後才梟首。
text: Jincheng County, originally a subordinate of Han Sui. After the Battle of Tongguan, Han Sui lost to Jincheng Qiangzhong, and was later killed by his account Xiping, Jincheng Zhujiang Yuyan, Jiang Shi, etc., and was sent to Cao Cao. One said that Han Sui died of illness.
